Post.title: 3Ghost
Post._content:
Ghost1.0Ghost-cli1.5.2
## 1. 
### 1.1 
GhostUbuntu 16 RaspbianUbutun
Ubutun[](https://ubuntu-mate.org/raspberry-pi/)
### 1.3 
~~~ bash
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y
sudo apt-get install nginx
sudo apt-get install mariadb-server
sudo ufw allow 'Nginx Full'
~~~
mariadb mysqlmysqlmariadbmysqlmysqloraclemysql
mariadbroot
ufw allow 'Nginx Full' HTTPHTTPS

### 1.4 Node.js
NodejsNodejs(v6.11.1)
~~~
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_6.x | sudo -E bash
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
~~~
### 1.5 Ghost-Cli
Ghost
~~~
sudo npm i -g ghost-cli
~~~

### 1.6 
#### 
~~~
adduser <username>
usermod -aG sudo <username>
su - <username>
~~~
username 

#### 
~~~
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/ghost
sudo chown [user]:[user] /var/www/ghost
cd /var/www/ghost
~~~
## 2. Ghost
~~~
ghost install
~~~

Ghost1.5.2

4. Ghostghost_production
5. ghost
6. Nginx
7. SSL
